frontmatter.shortExcerpt: A step-by-step guide on how to build a classifier to predict food types. Getting the know the widgets Test and Score, Logistic Regression, Confusion Matrix, Predictions.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: New Text Mining Tutorial: a step-by-step guide on how to build a classifier to predict food types. Evaluating model accuracy, looking at misclassifications, and extending predictions to new foods. Getting the know the widgets Test and Score, Logistic Regression, Confusion Matrix, and Predictions.
